home_desc: Find which brand is taking our hard earned money outside India. Type brand name OR category like cream
share_text: *Find Swadeshi* (https://www.buyswadeshi.store) helps you know which brand is Indian and which is not. You can get list of Indian brands in your favourite shopping category. *Download our app* (shorturl.at/ruFIV) to keep it handy. *Find Swadeshi is made by Indians to make India Atma Nirbhar*. #ConsumeIndianPromoteIndian
disclaimer_text: Every effort is made to maintain accuracy of all information. However, actual product packaging and materials may contain more and/or different information. It is recommended not to solely rely on the information presented.
